About Us

Meet the founders

Who are we

Arete is an initiative which aims to equip children with ICT skills; focusing on the foundational skills namely Microsoft Office Tools and scratch.

What do we do

We also partner with tech hubs, NGOs, communities who have a similar goal as ours.

A brief history of arete

Arete was founded in December 2019 by Maryann Onuoha, Ifihan Olusheye, Abisola Jegede and Mbaoma Chioma M. Weâ€™ve had support from many individuals of notable mention are Olumide Ogundare, Timilehin Olumofin, Akinwunmi Aguda and Olamide Aboyeji.

Our team

Our team consists of amazing individuals. From the amazing team , to the bookclub team to the core team. Arete is a made up of a group of individuals who are interested in making impact into the society and helping the future generation to excel at soft skills.
